disclaimerText: This forecast is intended to provide information on expected pollution levels in areas of significant public exposure. It may not apply in very specific locations close to unusually strong or short-lived local sources of pollution.

currentForecast.forecastSummary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Tuesday 28 June to end of Wednesday 29 June GMT
currentForecast.forecastText: Tuesday will be predominantly dry with sunny spells, cloud cover will develop in the afternoon. Wednesday forecast to have cloud cover and some showers arriving from the west.  <br/><br/>The 'clean' south-westerly air-feed should limit the availability of the precursor chemicals required for ground-level ozone to form. In addition, increased cloud cover will reduce the ability of sunlight to power these reactions.<br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' for the following pollutants throughout the forecast period:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>PM10 Particulate<br/>PM2.5 Particulate<br/>Ozone<br/>Sulphur Dioxide
